sentences.cn: 香浓软润的巧克力蛋糕

sentences.en: Ferns grow in shady and moist places.
sentences.cn: 羊齿类植物生长在阴暗潮湿的地方.

sentences.en: Frogs produce slime to keep their skin moist.
sentences.cn: 青蛙分泌出黏液来使皮肤保持湿润.

sentences.en: He looked at her forehead, which was moist from her brisk walk.
sentences.cn: 他看着她, 她的前额因为走得急已渗出了汗水.

sentences.en: Her eyes were moist (= she was almost crying ) .
Her skin felt moist and feverish.
sentences.cn: 她的皮肤摸上去又湿又热.

sentences.en: Keep the soil moist. That way, the seedling will flourish.
sentences.cn: 保持土壤湿润，那样幼苗就能茁壮成长。

sentences.en: Make sure the soil is moist before planting the seeds.
sentences.cn: 播种之前要确保土壤湿润。

sentences.en: Strawberries grow best in a cool, moist climate.
sentences.cn: 草莓最适于在凉爽 、 潮湿的气候条件下生长.

sentences.en: The moist water of the earth is exhausted by evaporation.
sentences.cn: 土地中的水分全被蒸发光了.

sentences.en: The outside air was heavy and moist and sultry.
sentences.cn: 外面的空气沉滞、潮湿而闷热。

sentences.en: The soil is reasonably moist after the September rain.
sentences.cn: 9月的雨季过后，土壤已相当湿润。

sentences.en: This herbicide degrades in moist soil.
sentences.cn: 这种除草剂在潮湿的土壤中分解.

sentences.en: This suggests that the optimum for biological weathering would be in a hot, moist climate.
sentences.cn: 这表明生物风化最适宜的条件是湿热气候。

sentences.en: Winds from the sea are usually moist.
Wipe off any excess make-up with a clean, moist cotton flannel.
sentences.cn: 用干净的湿绒布擦去多余的化妆品。

trans.tran_cn: 潮湿的，微湿的，多雨的，含泪的
trans.tran_en: slightly wet, especially in a way that is pleasant or suitable
